attributes.action: Change the dates for all Injured Soldiers Compensation to the begining of the War
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The date for the new compensation for injured soldiers has been set halfway through the war and not at the begining. Thus, some soldiers are getting different rate of compensation due to the date of injury.  This is wrong, and everyone no matter when injured should get the same rate, surely the date for the new rates should be set at the beggining of the war.
